name: Uneed Web
description:
Uneed Web is a community of like-minded people, who share their love for work. And software? Software development is the mean for our love.
“accompanying customers not only by doing our work but also by being involved in their business process” Uneed Web began embodiment of the idea.
The company mainly focuses on:
web development
web/mobile design.
mobile development.
Our main services are providing your company with IT team members in form of:
dedicated team
project development
specialist for relocation
Our main technologies are:
Front-end: 
Web: JavaScript, Typescript
Frameworks: React.JS, Angular.JS, Vue
Database: Mongo, SQL
Platforms: Node.JS
Markup languages: HTML, CSS, JSON, Bootstrap
API: Google, Facebook, Twitter, Github
VCS: Git, Unit/Linux

Back-end:
Language: Java, JUnit, Mockito, JSF, CDI
XML: XSD, XPath
Web: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Database: Oracle, MS SQL, Sybase, Mongo
VCS: Mercurial, Git, SVN
CI: Jenkins

Let us discuss how we can leverage your IT resources.
